title: Welcome to Climate Tracker
subtitle: Your Window into Changing Earth
content: Explore Earth's changes through graphs on temperature, polar ice, methane, NO2, and CO2 over the years. Gain awareness and advocate for a sustainable future.
cta: Scroll down and begin your journey with us today!
homeQuizItem: Take the quiz to test you knowledge about climate change
refreshButton: Uh-oh! It looks like someone's been playing with the wires. Press me to get everything back on track!
